IMG1.jpg.desc: Overview of terminal ileum with focal erythema adjacent to a diverticulum.
IMG1.jpg.label: Bleed.

IMG2.jpg.desc: Close-up of suspected Meckel diverticulum showing adherent clot and mucosal defect.
IMG2.jpg.label: Clipping Result.

IMG3.jpg.desc: Sigmoid polyp at 30 cm, flat morphology with mildly irregular surface; resected.
IMG3.jpg.label: Adenoma.

WL3.png.desc: Normal colonic mucosa, no active bleeding in this field.
WL3.png.label: Normal.

WL4.png.desc: Endoscopic view showing clip placed at prior polypectomy site.
WL4.png.label: Hyperplasic lesion.

WL_55.png.desc: Wide-field image of colon with adequate bowel preparation and visible haustra.
WL_55.png.label: Overview.

WL_56.png.desc: Image demonstrating mucosal healing at prior polypectomy site.
WL_56.png.label: Adenoma.

WL_57.png.desc: Ileocecal valve visualized with normal proximal mucosa.
WL_57.png.label: Ileocecal valve.

WL_58.png.desc: Localized edema near the diverticulum; no active bleeding at time of exam.
WL_58.png.label: Edema.

WL_59.png.desc: Polypectomy site with visible cautery artifact and minimal oozing controlled.
WL_59.png.label: Polypectomy site.

WL_65.png.desc: Wide-angle view of sigmoid colon with clear visualization of haustral folds.
WL_65.png.label: Overview.

WL_66.png.desc: Close-up showing clip applied to bleeding point.
WL_66.png.label: Adenoma.

WL_67.png.desc: Post-polypectomy inspection image showing clean resection base.
WL_67.png.label: Post-polypectomy.

WL_68.png.desc: Random white-light view used for documentation.
WL_68.png.label: Overview.

WL_69.png.desc: Additional overview image for completeness of documentation.
WL_69.png.label: Overview.
